s: FIRST: Sign the enclosed Citizens’ Advisory Ballot to show our Alaska allies your strong personal support to reinstate the ban on “same-day airborne land-and-shoot” wolf killing in Alaska;

LESSIG: Justice, we've argued that it would be inappropriate in this case for the Court to consider the prospective line until they decide whether the case, whether the prospective and retrospective is severable, and we submit it's an easy case to show that it's not.
[tolling of bells, camera pans to show the crows flying toward a coastal island]
Show us what is on that piece of cloth there.
[the Black Pearl is shown at night in a thunderstorm]
[Jack shows his right hand is untouched, but Tia unwraps the bandage on his left hand]
[Jack shows Jones the picture of the key]
[camera shows Will hitching a ride on the front of the Flying Dutchman, between the jaw formations]
[Elizabeth's wedding dress is shown underwater, sinking into the depths of the sea]
[downwards view, showing that the chest is empty, Jones tilts his head back and shouts]
The Movie Show is returning to SBS soon.
Ok - enough of Totally Rad Show - gotsta get back to work!
